ValidationRule.description: Yogiyo refund with the type of CSC Refund target, Refund Amount, Bank Name, Bank Account Name Bank Account Number should be mandatory Mobile Phone Number
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: RecordType.Id = "01211000000D1fV" && ISPICKVAL( Type ,"CSC") && (ISBLANK( Bank_Account_Name__c ) || ISBLANK( Bank_Name__c )|| ISBLANK( Refund_Amount__c ) || ISBLANK( Bank_Account_Number__c )|| ISBLANK( Customer_Phone_Number_2__c) || ISPICKVAL( Target__c, "") )
